tokens: On December 14 , a gunman identified as 20 year-old Adam Lanza killed his mother Nancy then went into Sandy Hook Elementary school carrying a Bushmaster AR-15 rifle and two other handguns , where he opened fire killing 26 people , 20 of them children between the ages of five and ten years old .
sentence: On December 14 , a gunman identified as 20 year-old Adam Lanza killed his mother Nancy then went into Sandy Hook Elementary school carrying a Bushmaster AR-15 rifle and two other handguns , where he opened fire killing 26 people , 20 of them children between the ages of five and ten years old .
